org.mini2Dx.core.collision.util

Class StaticCollisionCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Shape
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Circle
        • org.mini2Dx.core.collision.util.StaticCollisionCircle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionArea, CollisionObject, Positionable, Sizeable, Interpolatable, org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class StaticCollisionCircle
extends Circle
implements CollisionArea
    An implementation of a collision circle that does not move between updates/frames, thus, does not register as an interpolating collision. Due to this, memory and CPU overhead are reduced compared to using the CollisionCircle implementation.

    • Field Summary
